name: EmailBro
0:
”Alexa, launch email bro”
”Alexa, ask email bro to help me with an email”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: email bro
des: Email bro is your personal email buddy that helps you compose emails of all sorts! You could ask email bro about how to begin, end, or compose the content for a formal, semi formal, or informal email! In the present day world, the ability to write appropriate emails for different people and circumstances is crucial to everyday life, have email bro help you out!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
